title: SBF Launches $80 Million Bipartisan Political Influence Campaign Using Stolen Customer Funds
description: Sam Bankman-Fried systematically deploys approximately $80 million in FTX customer funds for bipartisan political influence, publicly donating $40 million to Democrats while secretly funding an equal amount to Republicans through 'dark money' channels and co-conspirators. The operation specifically targets Senate Agriculture Committee members overseeing crypto regulation, including Senators Debbie Stabenow and John Boozman, to secure favorable legislation and regulatory capture.
